message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS. 

The paper deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on training embeddings that accurately capture the sense of words in a limited set of focused topics. This suggests that the paper belongs to the category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). The paper also discusses various strategies for adapting pre-trained embeddings, which falls under the category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper proposes using a large, topic-rich source corpus (such as Wikipedia) to augment the limited corpus, which involves information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and data structures (cs.DS).
